init.title: Subaru Starlink Options
init.description: When enabled, vehicle polling will send a remote command to your vehicle every 2 hours to obtain new sensor data. Without vehicle polling, new sensor data is only received when the vehicle automatically pushes data (normally after engine shutdown).
